title: How to Make Papaya Jam

steps.headline: Cut the ripe papaya in half.
steps.description: Mash the ripe papaya or blend it.

steps.headline: Peel off the ginger clean and cut into small pieces and pound it into the stone mortar until the ginger crushed balance
Heat the frying pot make sure it is clean and ready to use.
Put the mashed ripe papaya into the frying pot.
steps.description: Stir  always so that the jam will not stick in a pot.

steps.headline: After 10 minutes, put the mashed ripe papaya into a  pot, followed by the crushed ginger.
Stir until the mashed papaya becomes elastic.
Add the sugar into the papaya stir until the sugar is thoroughly blended.

text: Cut the ripe papaya in half. Mash the ripe papaya or blend it. Peel off the ginger clean and cut into small pieces and pound it into the stone mortar until the ginger crushed balance  Heat the frying pot make sure it is clean and ready to use.  Put the mashed ripe papaya into the frying pot. Stir  always so that the jam will not stick in a pot. After 10 minutes, put the mashed ripe papaya into a  pot, followed by the crushed ginger.  Stir until the mashed papaya becomes elastic.  Add the sugar into the papaya stir until the sugar is thoroughly blended.  Finished.
